author: Staff Reporter
text:
Declining industrial production and no new industrial units in Puducherry have affected the revenue collection of the Central Excise Puducherry Commissionerate.

U.Niranjan, Commissioner, Central Excise and Service Tax, on Tuesday said that NCR Corporation ,which was handsomely paying tax, had reduced production.

He added that the turnover of the skin care unit of Hindustan Unilever Limited and L&T had come down.

The revenue target collection this year is Rs. 500 crore from excise duty and Rs. 270 crore from service tax. They have collected up to Rs. 476 crore and Rs. 235 crore respectively.
title: Revenue collection hit
